abilities.name: Fluid Swing
abilities.description: Tankbuster

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description: Raidwide causing significant damage

abilities.name: Protean Wave
abilities.description: Proteans coming from the boss and/or the tornadoes.

abilities.name: Hand of Prayer/Parting
abilities.description: Very minor raidwide damage if the hand is brought far/close to the body, respectively. Wipe otherwise.

abilities.name: Fluid Swing/Strike
abilities.description: Tankbuster coming from both the body and the hand.

abilities.name: Exhaust
abilities.description: Minor damage coming from the dolls.

abilities.name: Hand of Pain
abilities.description: Incredibly minor damage as long as the hand is within 5% of the boss.

abilities.name: Splash
abilities.description: 6 back to back raidwides.

abilities.name: Drainage
abilities.description: Tethered AOE tank busters.

abilities.name: Exhaust
abilities.description: Minor damage coming from the dolls.

abilities.name: Throttle
abilities.description: Debuff on 6 players that must be cleansed or they will die.

abilities.name: Limit Cut
abilities.description: Trio mechanic with Brute Justice and Cruise Chaser.

abilities.name: J-Kick
abilities.description: Raidwide damage when BJ/CC enter the arena.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Raidwide damage cast by Cruise Chaser.

abilities.name: Judgement Nisi
abilities.description: Places Nisi debuffs on 4 players that must be passed throughout the phase.

abilities.name: Link-Up
abilities.description: Summons chkrams on the outside of the arena.

abilities.name: Optical Sight
abilities.description: Locks onto the position of each player. A big AoE will hit that location in a few seconds.

abilities.name: Photon
abilities.description: Drops everyone to 1 HP. Must have shields to survive Nisi dot.

abilities.name: Hawk Blaster
abilities.description: Large AoE at every players position during Optical Sight

abilities.name: Spin Crusher
abilities.description: Baited conal AoE.

abilities.name: Crashing Wave
abilities.description: Large AoE on the player with a water debuff. Must be soaked by 3-4 players.

abilities.name: Crashing Thunder
abilities.description: Large AoE on the player with a lightning debuff. Must be soaked with 1 tank.

abilities.name: Missle Command
abilities.description: Baited ground AoEs.

abilities.name: Earth Missle
abilities.description: Places 2 mines that must be stepped on.

abilities.name: Hidden Mine
abilities.description: Damage from the mines placed by Earth Missle. Deals significant damage to the tank blowing them up.

abilities.name: Enumeration
abilities.description: Requires 2 stacks of 3 players. Deals no damage.

abilities.name: Verdict
abilities.description: Places debuffs on players designating their final nisi requirement.

abilities.name: Limit Cut (Shield)
abilities.description: Creates a shield that must be burned down quickly.

abilities.name: Flarethrower
abilities.description: Large conal AoE from Brute Justice. Used to blow up a water tornado.

abilities.name: Propeller Wind
abilities.description: AoE from Cruise Chaser that must be line-of-sighted behind a frozen pillar.

abilities.name: Gavel
abilities.description: Resolves nisi debuffs. Deals no damage if nisis are correct.

abilities.name: Photon (Tanks)
abilities.description: Drops both tanks to 1 HP.

abilities.name: Double Rocket Punch
abilities.description: Shared tank buster.

abilities.name: Super Jump
abilities.description: Baited AoE on the furthest player from Brute Justice.

abilities.name: Apocalyptic Ray
abilities.description: Baited conal AoE at furthest player from Brute Justice.
